text: Namma Ooru Nayagan (Tamil: நம்ம ஊரு நாயகன்) is a 1988 Indian Tamil film, directed by Yaar Kannan and produced by V. Anbukarasu. The film stars Ramarajan, Gouthami and Sripriya in lead roles. The film had musical score by newcomer Rajesh Khanna. ==Cast== *Ramarajan *Gouthami *Sripriya ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by Rajesh Khanna. {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:95%;" !
